it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class XmlPublicObjectiveLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.XmlLoader
      • it.polimi.se2018.controller.XmlCardLoader
        • it.polimi.se2018.controller.XmlPublicObjectiveLoader

  • public class XmlPublicObjectiveLoader
extends XmlCardLoader
    The class to load files from the directory 'resources/public_objective_cards'. It's also a factory for PublicObjectiveCards and the classes to calculate the relative scores, since, the method load returns an array of a given number of cards.
    Author:
    michelemarzollo

      The RuntimeException thrown when the file to load was validated, but the parser couldn't create the object to construct from it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlPublicObjectiveLoader

        public XmlPublicObjectiveLoader()
                         throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Creates a new XmlPublicObjectiveLoader that can load cards from xmls contained in the specified directory.

        It also loads the xsd file which card definitions are checked against.

        The default set of cards will be loaded.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified directory isn't actually a directory or it isn't readable.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if sax validator or sax parser cannot be used.

      • XmlPublicObjectiveLoader

        public XmlPublicObjectiveLoader(java.lang.String basePath,
                                java.lang.String listName)
                         throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Creates a new XmlPublicObjectiveLoader that can load cards from xmls contained in the specified directory.

        It also loads the xsd file which card definitions are checked against.

        Parameters:
        basePath - The directory that contains the xmls.
        listName - The name of the list file containing the names of the available files to load.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified directory isn't actually a directory or it isn't readable.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if sax validator or sax parser cannot be used.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public PublicObjectiveElements load(int n)
        Tries to load n unique cards from the base directory.

        If there are not enough valid public objectives, the size of the result array is lower than n.

        Parameters:
        n - The number of unique cards to load.
        Returns:
        An array of size at most n containing a set of unique cards.
